text: Norman Smith (20 September 1897 – 1978) was an English footballer who played as a right-back in the Football League for Charlton Athletic and Queens Park Rangers. ==References== Category:1897 births Category:1978 deaths Category:People from Newburn Category:Sportspeople from Northumberland Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Tottenham Hotspur F.C. players Category:Charlton Athletic F.C. players Category:Queens Park Rangers F.C. players Category:Chelsea F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Norman Smith (footballer, born September 1897)
